scripts.start-student: start bash -c 'cd Student/frontend; bash -c "npm  start"' && start bash -c 'cd Student/backend; bash -c "nodemon index.js"'
scripts.pull-start-student: git pull origin master && start bash -c 'cd Student/frontend; bash -c "npm  start"' && start bash -c 'cd Student/backend; bash -c "nodemon index.js"'
scripts.start-admin: start bash -c 'cd Admin/frontend; bash -c "npm  start"' && start bash -c 'cd Admin/backend; bash -c "nodemon index.js"'
scripts.pull-start-admin: git pull origin master && start bash -c 'cd Admin/frontend; bash -c "npm  start"' && start bash -c 'cd Admin/backend; bash -c "nodemon index.js"'
scripts.start: start bash -c 'cd Student/frontend;bash -c "npm  start"' && start bash -c 'cd Student/backend;bash -c "nodemon index.js"' && start bash -c 'cd Admin/frontend;bash -c "npm  start"' && start bash -c 'cd Admin/backend;bash -c "nodemon index.js"'
scripts.pull-start: git pull origin master && start bash -c 'cd Student/frontend;bash -c "npm  start"' && start bash -c 'cd Student/backend;bash -c "nodemon index.js"' && start bash -c 'cd Admin/frontend;bash -c "npm  start"' && start bash -c 'cd Admin/backend;bash -c "nodemon index.js"'
scripts.setup: start bash -c 'cd Student/frontend; bash -c "npm i"' && start bash -c 'cd Student/backend; bash -c "npm i"' && start bash -c 'cd Admin/frontend; bash -c "npm i"' && start bash -c 'cd Admin/backend; bash -c "npm i"'
